Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide fuel cells (RSOFCs), with high energy densities, long operating times, and intermediate power ratings, have become promising devices for renewable energy storage.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: A metal hydride (MH) tank is a prospective thermochemical heat and hydrogen storage unit.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: External heat source such as waste steam is a well-known efficiency booster for high temperature electrolysis system.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: Here, we propose a novel RSOFC system coupled with MH and waste steam.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: The MH materials of MgH2-5 at.% V and LaNi5 were used for high-temperature MH (HTMH) case and low-temperature MH (LTMH) case calculations, respectively.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: We found that, In HTMH case, the H-2 compression power was low, but the MH tank produced steam only during the last 29% of the total absorption time.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: When the MH tank produced steam, the SOEC mode efficiency increased by 19.3% points.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: In the SOFC mode, the MH tank stored 76% of heat released from stack, and the system efficiency was lower than stack efficiency by 6% points.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: The system round trip efficiencies of HTMH system and LTMH system were 45.6% and 48.1%, respectively.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: For a specific HTMH material, there is an optimal current density in the SOEC mode where heat from MH tank can be used completely and the external heat source is minimal.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam

Sentencas: By choosing appropriate operating strategy or MH material, the high temperature MH can result in a system round-trip efficiency comparable to that of a low temperature MH combined with an external heat utilization system.
Titulo: A novel electrical energy storage system based on a reversible solid oxide fuel cell coupled with metal hydrides and waste steam
